column1: '''Carolynne Cunningham''' served as an assistant director for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and was a producer for [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].

column2: Outstanding Directorial Achievement in Motion Pictures
